page.title: 15HOME FARM,BRIMSTAGE
page.content: Home Farm covers 123 acres of land in mid-Wirral.It is owned by{Viscount {Leverhulme.}Leverhulme Estates have farmed the land since 1970.Before that it was tenanted. Home Farm is a dairy farm with 115 {Guernsey cows.}They produce "gold topped" milk.They also keep a Guernsey bull which is very fierce.The cows graze in hedged pastures but are restricted to certain parts of the field by electric fencing. Some of the fields grow{grass}which is intensively managed and cut to feed the cows during the winter. It is hoped that this year Home Farm will produce about 700 tons of good quality{wheat}for bread,500 tons of barley which is made into beer and cattle cake,and 100 tons of{oil seed {rape.
